description.overview: Opportunities represents favorable timing windows, lucky breaks, and moments when doors open for you.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Jupiter and Venus transits to your natal Jupiter, Venus, and key houses (2nd = resources and value, 11th = networks and future possibilities). Jupiter expands opportunities and brings good fortune. Venus attracts favorable circumstances and helpful people. When these planets form supportive aspects, opportunities appear naturally and timing works in your favor. Challenging aspects create missed timing, doors that stay closed, or opportunities that look good but aren't. Jupiter retrograde reduces opportunity flow by 30%, Venus by 30%.

primary_planets.jupiter: Expansion, good fortune, opportunities that enlarge your world
primary_planets.venus: Attraction, favorable circumstances, helpful people and resources

secondary_planets.uranus: Sudden unexpected opportunities and breakthrough timing

key_houses.2: Resources, value, what you have to work with and attract
key_houses.11: Networks, future possibilities, community and collective opportunities

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum opportunity impact - major doors opening or closing
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension between different opportunities
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - opportunities come naturally and easily
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - opportunities require effort or timing is off
aspect_weights.sextile: Moderate flow - favorable circumstances you can act on

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Practical and timing-focused - talk about windows, readiness, acting on openings
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize acting on opportunities, saying yes, putting yourself out there, timing is right
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Normalize closed-door periods as preparation time, trust in divine timing, build skills while waiting
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Acknowledge bad timing without catastrophizing - redirect to what you can control (preparation)

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Opportunities are flowing your way today - doors are opening and timing is working in your favor. Say yes and put yourself out there.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: There are possibilities but timing feels uncertain - explore what's available without overcommitting until things clarify.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Opportunities feel scarce or timing is off today - trust this closed-door period is preparation time, and keep building skills while you wait.
